channel.title: [317]2 Questions
channel.description:
I need help with 2 things...
When I first got my server source, everything was covered in snow, which means the weather was changed. When I looked in the data and config files where the weather file usually is, it wasn't there. I need someone to help me find it.
Also, my herblore shop is so messed up, I don't know what goes with what anymore. The only potions I know how to make are Super Strength with the Kwuarm + Water, Super Defence with the Cadantine + Water, Prayer Potion with the Ranarr Weed + Water, Super Attack with the Irit + Water, and the Ranging Potion with the Dwarf Weed + Water. If anyone could help me figure out which goes with which it would help out alot.
[center][img]http://i38.tinypic.com/2gtn7k1.png[/img][/center]

item.title: [317]2 Questions
item.dc:creator: @WestSideMass WestSideMass
item.description:
@WestSideMass wrote:

Thanks guys, I would Rep if I could…

Read full topic

item.title: [317]2 Questions
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

Server sided. Client.java. Search for “make a” or “potion” look into those item used on item methods, and edit the herb id, and the delete item id, and the id of the potion to receive.

Read full topic

item.title: [317]2 Questions
item.dc:creator: @WestSideMass WestSideMass
item.description:
@WestSideMass wrote:

How do I add/edit the potion options?
Like change what you use to make them.

Read full topic

item.title: [317]2 Questions
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

First, the snow, it’s not from a weather file. It was a grass texture that was changed to snow, through the cache.

Also, most 317’s released on Mopar have really bad herblore bases. To make the potions, you use the herbs on the vials of water. This only works though with the herbs coded in the server. Which most of those 317’s only have about 4-5 working potion-making.

Read full topic

item.title: [317]2 Questions
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

  1. it’s a int a client that determines the weather

  2. Item on item packet

Read full topic
